title: Chef

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Taste a player each night. You will learn how many sentences of flavourtext their role has.
- Relish a player each night. You will learn whether their role is very flavourful, somewhat flavourful, or not flavourful in the host's opinion. A role's flavourfulness is how well its mechanics align with its lore, like 2351: Cameraman's. A role with no discernible lore like 1311: Cryptid is not flavourful.
